MajorClaims.MC1: stress management is an essential skill for everyone to learn and find their own way to solve their stress
MajorClaims.MC2: stress management, how to survive our unbearable stress, is the most important skill that we should have

Claims.C1: if we don't have a good stress management skill, it may lead to some critical problems
Claims.C2: stress management recently becomes a more significant issue in our realization
Claims.C3: it is necessary that we should reduce and cope with our stress in the goal of balancing our mind and body

Premises.P1: Stress, our body's way of responding to any kind of demand, can be caused by both good and bad experiences
Premises.P2: Stress may be a positive mobilization to drive for success
Premises.P3: it is widely thought that we experience stress any time, which comes across unexpectedly that frustrates our goals
Premises.P4: Some people regard stress as a power, which overcomes the obstacles to motivate themselves to do their best
Premises.P5: other people cannot charge of their thoughts, emotions, and the way they deal with problems
Premises.P6: In the frenetic, fast-paced world, it is a very common predicament that all of us, from the young to the senior, feel depressed caused by stress, such as financial problems, exam stress, relationship difficulties and work overload
Premises.P7: some people have physical problems, such as insomnia and headaches
Premises.P8: Melancholia, the most fatal problem, even leads some people to commit suicide
Premises.P9: stress takes a toll on our health
Premises.P10: This is one of the reasons why people were overwhelmed by constant stress
Premises.P11: It is known that the modern life is frequently full of hassles, frustrations, and demands
